arts.ttl: New images from Stamford Bridge show nearly an entire row of seats were torn out by travelling Gent supporters during chaotic Conference League clash with Chelsea
arts.sum: The action off the field often threatened to eclipse the exhibition of creative football on it, with frequent verbal exchanges between the sets of supporters at times boiling over into more serious incidents

arts.ttl: Chelsea's best and worst players in impressive victory over Gent
arts.sum: After a difficult start to life at Chelsea, Neto took the opportunity to flex his quality against Gent, charging down the right wing with indefatigable endeavour and causing real problems for his defender. Plenty of players deserve an extra shout-out - Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall, Cesare Casadei and Mykhailo Mudryk all impressed - but Pedro Neto earns our honourable mention after firing home Chelsea's second of the evening.
